001package pkg_class;
002
003
004/**
005 * DÃ©crivez votre classe TravellerPnj ici.
006 *
007 * @author Elie DUBOUX
008 * @version 2021.01
009 */
010public class TravellerPnj extends Pnj
011{
012    /**
013     * The feather.
014     */
015    private Item aFeather;
016    /**
017     * Check if the pnj has moved.
018     */
019    private boolean aHasMoved;
020    /**
021     * The room where the pnj is currently in.
022     */
023    private Room aCurrentRoom;
024    /**
025     * Constructor.
026     * @param pName The name of the pnj.
027     * @param pSpeech The default speech.
028     * @param pStartingRoom The room where it appear first.
029     * @param pFeather The item "feather".
030     */
031    public TravellerPnj(final String pName, final String pSpeech,final Room pStartingRoom, final Item pFeather)
032    {
033        super(pName, pSpeech);
034        this.aFeather = pFeather;
035        this.aCurrentRoom = pStartingRoom;
036        this.aHasMoved = false;
037    }//TravellerPnj()
038    
039    /**
040     * Change the room of the traveller.
041     * @return The message when he disappear
042     */
043    public String changeRoom()
044    {
045        this.aCurrentRoom.removePnj(this);
046        this.aCurrentRoom = this.aCurrentRoom.getExit("north");
047        this.aCurrentRoom.addPnj(this);
048        this.aHasMoved = true;
049        this.changeSpeech("Oh this feather... I found it in a really dark room, maybe there is something usefull there.");
050        return "See you again hehehe. \nHe disappeared while walking through the mist";
051    }//changeRoom()
052    
053    /**
054     * Give the player the feather.
055     * @param pPlayer The player.
056     */
057    public void giveFeather(final Player pPlayer)
058    {
059        if (!pPlayer.hasFeather())
060        {
061            pPlayer.giveFeather();
062            pPlayer.addItems(this.aFeather, 1);
063            this.changeSpeech("For what I have studied, this feather might allows you to transform into something...");
064        }
065    }//giveFeather()
066    
067    /**
068     * Check if the traveller is still in the starting room.
069     * @return True if the traveller has already moved,
070     * false otherwise.
071     */
072    public boolean hasMoved()
073    {
074        return this.aHasMoved;
075    }//getRoom()
076}//TravellerPnj
